title: FitTrack
description: This fitness tracking app was created in Android Studio using Java. I was responsible for all of the profile and workout functionality. This included workout plans, sets/reps tracking, and exercise selection from exercise API.

title: Adoptm
description: This pet adoption app was created in Android Studio using Java. The project group followed the SCRUM model with an issue board, sprints, and code reviews. GitLab CI/CD was used for faster testing and devlopment.

title: Cookbook Web App
description: This cookbook application was created using the MERN stack. MongoDB, Express, React.JS, Node.JS. The app allows users to view, post, and edit the information for recipes including ingredients, instructions, and pictures.

title: MIPS Processor
description: This hardware model of a MIPS processor was created using VHDL. The project included both a software and hardware pipelined version. The pipeline is 5 stages and makes use of data forwarding. The hardware pipeline includes static branch prediction.
